content.answer:
You may need to enable cookies in your Safari browser. Follow these instructions to enable cookies:



∙ Click the Safari menu in the top right. It resembles a small gear icon. Or, in newer versions of Safari, click the "Safari" dropdown in the top left of your screen. ∙ Select "Preferences" ∙ Click the Privacy tab ∙ In the "Block Cookies" section, select "Never"
content.name: I am having issues accessing WNBA League Pass in Safari on a Mac.
